short_summary: TASK based professional services (tsp) requirement.uk based senior financial management (fmt) consultant required
description: uk based senior financial management (fmt) consultant required to put in place practices and tools to improve financial services and look for innovative ways to address service delivery challenges and identify cost effective ways to improve resourcing delivery across the agency. also propose improvements and a strategy to implement theories initiated earlier.
